description:
Amazing things keep happening, one after the other.  First a mysterious boy enters the batter`s cage, taking up the challenge against Ryo.  And the next day, Ryo is offered a scholarship for a prestigious girls` school!  But she can`t possibly accept it...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Baseball Team at a Prestigious Girls` School?
Un club de baseball dans un lycée de filles aisées ?
名門女子高に野球部が?
